title: Trees as a metaphor to understand relationships in biology
content:
by Roland G. Roberts, on behalf of PLOS Biology staff editors

The phylogenetic tree has been a core conceptual tool for evolutionary biology for nearly 200 years. This editorial explores the role of the tree as a metaphor, discussing two new PLOS Biology Essays that look to the future.
